1.content:
Zach is a 10 year old boy who dreams of becoming a pokemon master like his older brother Damon. He wasn't old enough to go with Damon and had to stay home.

"I wish I could join you Damon" said Zach. "I wish you could too Zach. But your not old enough yet. But you will be soon and then maybe we can have a battle someday" said Damon.

Damon then said his goodbyes and left on his journey. That was three years ago when Zach saw Damon and he hasn't heard from him yet.

He then realize Damon had went missing and police had no leads where he could be. Their mother was worried that something happen to their son.

Zach then reach 10 years old and was ready to become a pokemon trainer. His mother, at first, didn't want him to go. But she knew she wouldn't be able to stop him.

Zach then got everything ready to go on his journey and find his older brother. "Alright mom I'm ready to go now" Zach said to his mother.

"Zach you just be careful now. I don't want you to go missing like your older brother" said his mother. "I won't mom. I'll find Damon and bring him back home I promise"

He then hug his mother goodbye and left. Where did he go first?
1.title: Zach the rookie trainer.

choices: Have you heard anything from... Damon?
To help you in your research.
I'm trying to find some leads to look for Damon.
11.content:
Zach hurried to Rowan's lab, with an excited enthusiasm. He was a bout to get his first Pokemon, and thanks to an exchange program from two other regions, he could choose amongst nine different starters, that joined in communication with Sinnoh; they where Jhoto and Unova.
Bursting in the door, Zach eagerly rushes towards Rowan, who chuckles at the childs eagerness.
"So Zach what can I help with you with today?"
Zach Responds...
11.title: Don't you know its dangerous to go alone?

111.content: "Of Course, for a Pokemon." He nods, pulling a briefcase with nine pokeballs inside, He points out each of the options. Peering over them, Zach chooses to go with a starter from...
111.title: A POKEMON OF COURSE

11122.content:
Zach chooses the pokemon Chikorita as he picks up the pokeball and let's Chikorita out. "Chika Chika" Chikorita goes up to Zach as it rub his head on his leg.

"Oh wow. Your a friendly Chikorita aren't you" said Zach as he pet's Chikorita. "It's no ordinary Chikorita. I've heard it belong to your brother once" said Professor Rowan.

"My brother?" Zach then remember he got a letter, from Damon, saying that he caught a Chikorita somewhere in the forest of Shino.

"I do remember my brother sending me a letter saying he caught a Chikorita before" said Zach. "Well we found this Chikorita somewhere here in Shino looking a little sad" said Professor Rowan.

"Professor I'm going to head out and find Damon" said Zach. "You be careful Zach. I don't want to lose you as well" said Professor Rowan.

After getting his first pokemon. Zach heads out. But what does he do first?
11122.title: Chikorita

111222.content: Excitedly Zach and Chikorita head out thanking Rowan. "I need to get stronger if I want to find Damon." Zach says Chikorita nodding. "Luckily the first gym is really close. and it's a water type gym." Out of curiosity Zack asks Chikorita. "Do you know what happened to Damon?"
111222.title: Head to the first gym

choices: Zach changes into a grass type pokemon
Zach can understand what pokemon can say
1112221.content: Chikorita nods her head. She knew what happen to her previous owner. Zach was a little bit surprise. But was happy that someone knew what happen to his older brother. "You do know what happen to Damon? Please Chikorita tell me" said Zach. "Chikorita tries to tell Zach" Chika Chika" But she forgot that humans couldn't understand what they say. "I wish I could understand what you said Chikorita" said Zach. Chikorita then got an idea. She got close to him and her body starts to glow a green color. "Chikorita what's happing to you?" Suddenly Zach get's a strange glow as well as felt strange.
1112221.title: Chikorita nods

choices: He got kidnap by team Galactic.
11122211.content:
When Zach stop glowing. A male Chikorita stood where Zach use to be. Zach had been change into a Chikorita and he was surprise by this.

"I'm a Chikorita" he then looks at Chikorita. "Chikorita why did you do this to me?" Chikorita felt a little bad for changing him.

"I'm sorry Zach. It was the only way you could understand me" said Chikorita. "So now what am I going to do?" Zach ask her.

"You can help me find Damon. I know what happen to him" said Chikorita. "Tell me then. What happen to him" said Zach.

"Well you see Zach. I fell in love with your brother. But he was a human and I was a pokemon. So I decided to change him to make him my mate. It work and Damon became a Chikorita like me. But something happen" said Chikorita.

"What happen?" Zach ask her.
11122211.title: Zach changes into a Chikorita

112.content:
"Have you heard anything from...Damon?" Zach ask Professor Rowan. "I am sorry Zach. I haven't heard anything from your older brother yet"

Zach felt a little depress. "I miss him Professor" said Zach. "As do I Zach. I'm sure your older brother is okay. We just have to keep our hopes up"

Professor Rowan place a hand on his shoulder as Zach begins to cheer up. "Now I'm sure your here for something else then news about your brother"

Zach just nod. "Yeah I want to get my first starter pokemon" said Zach. "Wait right here then while I'll go get the pokemon. If you want you can look around a bit"

Professor Rowan then goes into another room to get the pokemon for Zach
112.title: Have you heard anything from... Damon?

choices: Scarlet, a rather nice trainer, though has a serious competive side
Tanner, the most obnouxious brat in town.
1123.content: The tapping of footsteps on the tile floor alerts Zach that another trainer has arrived, probably for their Pokemon. Turning around Zach sees...
1123.title: A new challenger approaches!

11232.content:
It was Tanner... The bully, he would always make fun of Zach and that Damon disappeared, he never physically attacked Zack, but the pranks, rumors he starts, and comments are really depressing and hurtful. Sneering when he sees Zach he says
"Gee, What are you doing here Useless Loser? Didn't you know pokemon aren't given out to people who can't do anything? And hows that brother that died doing... oh wait he died, guess he was as Worthless as you."
11232.title: Tanner, the most obnouxious brat in town.

112322.content: Zach decided to ignore Tanner. He didn't want Tanner to get to him. "Hey are you listing to me loser? Your just as worthless as your dead brother is" Finally Professor Rowan came back and Tanner said nothing else as Zach choose the Shino starter Turtwig and Tanner choose Chimchar. Zach then heads out, on his journey, to find his missing brother. "Hey looser where are you going?" Tanner said to Zach. "Tanner leave me alone. I'm off to find Damon" said Zach. "To find his corpse maybe. He went missing three years. So he's dead. Hey why don't you take me on in a pokemon battle. Your going to loose to me anyway" said Tanner
112322.title: Ingore Tanner

1551.content:
Zach was heading to legendary Island. Home of the legendary pokemon.

He heard that Damon was last seen there and decided to head there.

After getting the starter pokemon, from professor Rowan, Zach heads to legendary Island.

After a few minuets. Zach gets to legendary Island as he holds Chimchar's pokeball.

"My brother is here somewhere. I have to find him. I'm counting on you Chimchar."

Zach then begins to explore legendary Island. As he look around. He comes upon a backpack and six empty pokeballs. He reconize the backpack.

"This is Damon's backpack and this must have been his pokemon. But where is he and his pokemon?"

As he wonders. Zach heard a voice. It was a
1551.title: An Island.

15511.content:
Zach couldn't make it out. It sounded quite small and cute. Then he starts to hear the voice again.

"Shaymin." He looks around and then looks down on the ground. Zach sees a small pokemon.

He reconize the pokemon. It was a Shaymin. A legendary pokemon from Shinnoh.

Zach read about Shaymins and how hard it was to find one. The Shaymin goes up to him on his leg.

"Shaymin." It had a smile on it's face. Zach picks the little guy up. "Aww hey little guy. Your so cute."

Shaymin just cuddle up in Zach's arms. He begins to pet the little guy. "Maybe you can help me find Damon."

Shaymin just smile as it starts to glow in his arms. Zach starts to feel weird. "Hey what are you doing?"

Zach then starts to change into.
15511.title: A Shaymin

15512.content:
It was a pokemon that Zach doesn't reconize. It was rather large and green as it approach him.

The pokemon didn't seem happy. "Who are you?" Zach reconize the voice to be femine and young.

"My name is Zach. I'm here looking for Damon." Said Zach. "How do you know about my dad?"

Zach was stun. "Dad? You know my brother?" He ask. "Damon is my dad. A male and strong Virizion like me."

Zach couldn't believe what he heard. Did she say his brother was a pokemon now? Suddenly another Virizion appear.

It was much bigger then the other one. "Mom. This human says he knows our father." Said the young Virizion.

"Is this true?" She looks at Zach. "Yes Damon is my older brother. Where is he and what did you do to him?" He ask.

"He's not here. Damon is quite happy here living on this Island with his new family." Said Virizion.

"That's not good enough." Said Zach. "Say what you will. Leave this Island and don't come back."

Virizion and her child left. Zach wasn't going to give up. She knew about Damon and he needed answers.
15512.title: A Virizion

info.brief_description: A story that was deleted a long time ago
info.description: Zach is a 10 year old boy who goes out on an adventure to become a pokemon trainer and search for his brother, Damon, who went missing 3 years ago after he went on his journey to become a pokemon master. Zach is now determine to find his older brother and bring him back home
